summary: World War II film about female volunteer workers at an optics plant who do their best to meet production targets.
cast: Takashi Shimura|Sôji Kiyokawa|Ichirô Sugai|Takako Irie|Yôko Yaguchi|Sayuri Tanima|Sachiko Ozaki|Shizuko Nishigaki|Asako Suzuki|Haruko Toyama|Aiko Masu|Kazuko Hitomi|Shizuko Yamada|Itoko Kôno|Toshiko Hattori|Emiko Rei|Haruko Mii|Minori Toyohara|Eiko Hirayama|Harue Yamashita|Mineko Mashiro|Isuzu Miyakawa|Michiko Aikawa|Teruko Kato|Akitake Kôno|Unpei Yokoyama|Chieko Nakakita|Koyuri Tanima
title: La más bella
